LanguageData.VREA_AndroidTech.label: androidtech
LanguageData.VREA_AndroidTech.description: The advanced technology needed to create and control ultra-tier androids - a complete replacement of organic colonists, capable of all the same tasks and activities without the drawbacks usually associated with humans.
LanguageData.VREA_NeutroamineLogistics.label: neutroamine logistics
LanguageData.VREA_NeutroamineLogistics.description: Construct specialized tanks, capable of storing large quantities of neutroamine, as well as pipes, taps and drain to move neutroamine through the system.
